## Disclosed type

Recursively replaces [PiiString](./paramodel.piistring.md) with `string`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type Disclosed<T> = (T extends PiiString ? string : T extends Array<infer E> ? Array<Disclosed<E>> : T extends Record<string, any> ? {
    [K in keyof T]: Disclosed<T[K]>;
} : T);
```
<b>References:</b> [PiiString](./paramodel.piistring.md)<!-- -->, [Disclosed](./paramodel.disclosed.md)
